user.title: Set up ChoreBoard
user.description: Enter your ChoreBoard credentials. The username and SECRET_KEY will be used to generate authentication tokens automatically.

data_description.secret_key: The Django SECRET_KEY from your ChoreBoard backend settings
data_description.url: Base URL of your ChoreBoard instance (e.g., http://localhost:8000)
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll for updates (10-300 seconds). Service calls trigger immediate updates regardless of this setting.

select_users.title: Select Users to Monitor
select_users.description: Choose which ChoreBoard users to create 'My Chores' sensors for. System-wide sensors (Outstanding, Late, Leaderboard) will be created automatically.

data_description.monitored_users: Select one or more users. A 'My Chores' sensor will be created for each.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to ChoreBoard API. Check the URL and network connectivity.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Verify your username and SECRET_KEY are correct.
error.no_users_selected: Please select at least one user to monitor.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This ChoreBoard instance and username combination is already configured.

scan_interval.title: Configure Update Interval
scan_interval.description: How often to poll the ChoreBoard backend for updates (in seconds). Changes made through Home Assistant will trigger immediate updates regardless of this setting.

data_description.scan_interval: Poll frequency in seconds (10-300). Default is 30 seconds.

monitored_users.title: Configure Monitored Users
monitored_users.description: Select which ChoreBoard users to monitor. A 'My Chores' sensor will be created for each selected user.

data_description.monitored_users: Select one or more users. Changes will be applied immediately.

credentials.title: Update Connection Settings
credentials.description: Update your ChoreBoard backend connection credentials and URL.
